#Carga la base de datos Airquality, para graficar con geom_line las temperaturas.
``` {r include = FALSE}
  library(tidyverse)
```

##Grafica:
``` {r}
  data(airquality)
  ggplot(data = airquality, aes(x = Temp, y = Day)) + 
    geom_line(alpha = 0.7, color = "red")

```
